attributes.action: Impose sanctions on China for human right abuses
attributes.additional_details:
More pressure must be put on China to improve their human rights, and stop their descent into a totalitarian dictatorship that matches North Korea.
All protest is crushed, political imprisonment is rife and restrictions on on all forms of media are growing every day.
It is our moral obligation as a free and strong country to protect human rights and those in need, even if it is politically or economically inconvenient.
